heading: Today
text: Some morning sun, giving way to clouds.  Scattered snow showers developing through NY in the afternoon, reaching northwest VT and Quebec late.   Highs from near 20 northeast, in the 20s west and south.  South winds developing near 10 mph, increasing to 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph from the Green Mountains west.

heading: Tonight
text: Periods of snow and snow showers north, localized south.  A dusting to 2 inches, locally more in the Adirondacks.  Some clearing late.  Lows in the teens to low 20s.  Winds south 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph from the Green Mountains west.

heading: Thursday
text: Variable clouds and sun, with localized snow showers, mostly through the north and mountains.  A bit milder.  Highs from the upper 20s to mid 30s north to south.  Winds southwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph.
